name: mmw.
description:
2021. 4950x4950px

I've managed to get a lot of experimentation out of my system. Now, with this first piece, I feel like I want to explore colour and abstraction within certain parameters. Parameters that will become clear as my work develops. 
My aim is to make Art that I and I hope you think is very, very beautiful. Something that is simple enough to stare at and day-dream into yet complex enough to hold the attention, like a flame can. 
I've had enough of 'what next!, what next!' I want to settle into my art practice and this is how I do that. 
This feels like My Mature Work.
